entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023
